original_title: 100,000 foreign tourists in Sri Lanka in June 2023
original_body_lines: According to the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority, nearly 100,000 foreign tourists have visited Sri Lanka during June 2023.
Chairman of the SLTDA Priyantha Fernando said that about 625,000 tourists visited the country so far in 2023.
Priyantha Fernando points out that  tourist arrivals in 2023 are significantly higher compared to 2022.
